    • Method Detail

      • moveOnFen

        public static java.lang.String moveOnFen(java.lang.String startFEN,
                                         java.lang.String move)
        Apply a move on a fen string.
        Parameters:
        startFEN - start position in FEN format
        move - A move in Algebraic Notation.
        Returns:
        A String containing the new FEN format.

      • show_chessboard

        public static void show_chessboard()
        draw the chessboard on an out console Black Square are represented by # character
        White Square by a space charactere.
        I keep conventionnal notation for chess piece
        r black root
        n black knight
        b black bishop
        q black queen
        k black king
        p black pawn
        R white Root
        N white Knight
        B white Bishop
        Q white Queen
        K white King
        P white Pawn

      • assign_chessboard

        public static void assign_chessboard(java.lang.String lineFEN)
        Assign a string FEN format to a virtual chessboard
        Call this method before using show_chessboard() method.
        Parameters:
        lineFEN - A string containing a FEN position

      • convert

        public static void convert(java.lang.String coord)
        Convert a string chessboard coordinate into a numeric convention. ie e2e4 give 5 2 5 4
        Parameters:
        coord - A String with Square coordonate.
